title: Divya Mutyala Haaram - Diamond & Pearl Splendor
features: This exquisite haaram reimagines traditional South Indian design with a modern sensibility. Features a central floral motif encrusted with CZ diamonds and highlighted by a vibrant emerald. The graceful chain is meticulously crafted with floral elements and delicate CZ accents, interspersed with lustrous South Sea pearl drops, reminiscent of 'Mutyala Potu'. The hanging pendant has a detailed gold cap with a coral bead at the bottom. The Hyderabadi polish imparts a rich, warm glow to the gold, enhancing the overall opulence.
occasions: festive celebrations like Diwali or Sankranthi
and even sophisticated modern events. This haaram is a statement piece ideal for making a lasting impression.
description: A timeless blend of tradition and contemporary elegance, this haaram showcases the finest craftsmanship of Hyderabad. The lustrous South Sea pearls symbolize purity and prosperity, while the brilliant CZ diamonds add a touch of modern glamour. Lightweight and comfortable to wear, it's designed to be cherished for generations. The combination of Emerald and Coral provides a unique touch for added style.
